overview: Documentation of Lygia Pape’s 1968 performance Divisor - reactivated in the city of Villeurbanne (France) in October 2014. Commissioned by Institut d'Art Contemporain de Villeurbanne / Rhône-Alpes.
tagline: Documentation of Lygia Pape’s 1968 performance Divisor.
title: DIVISOR / VILLEURBANNE
